text: Dang, I'm getting old!  I remember when my sister had an NES with this entire series and we'd always play this.  She's 24 and I'm 20.  This was the first game I've ever played at the age of 3.  The game means a lot to me.  My NES would always screw up mid-game, and that's why I have the All-Stars cart on SNES.  Save functions FTW!
